import React from "react"; import { Pie } from "react-chartjs-2"; import { CardBody, Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, DropdownItem, DropdownMenu, DropdownToggle, Table, UncontrolledDropdown } from "reactstrap"; import { MoreHorizontal } from "react-feather"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faSquare } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; const PieChart = () => { const data = { labels: ["Social", "Search Engines", "Direct", "Other"], datasets: [ { data: [260, 125, 54, 146], backgroundColor: ["#47BAC1", "#fcc100", "#f44455", "#E8EAED"], borderColor: "transparent" } ] }; const options = { maintainAspectRatio: false, legend: { display: false } }; return (
